content: hill & dale cowl yarn 2 skeins sweetgeorgia worsted 200 yards/183 meters per skein materials set of 4 0 mm and 5 0 mm 24 circular needles or needles required to obtain gauge gauge 20 sts / 4 inches in pattern before blocking on larger needles finished 10 tall / 25 wide after blocking circumference = 50 measurements pattern with larger needles cast on 220 sts and join to knit in the round being careful not to twist round 1 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end round 2 repeat round 1 round 3 *p2 k2 repeat from * to end round 4 repeat round 3 repeat these rounds until work measures approximately 6 5 ending with round 4 switch to smaller needles and begin 2x2 ribbing work in ribbing for 3 bind off in pattern finishing block with a light steam or soak for 15 minutes in a basin with mild detergent press out water and lay flat to dry happy knitting
